articles.description: I had to buy crypto, open a digital wallet, wait a week to actually use my crypto on apps, and then had to connect them all. That's just half of it.
articles.content:
Earlier this month, I bought an NFT on OpenSea, the largest online marketplace for buying and selling digital assets.
I wrote about how arduous the process was and how long it took me when starting … [+3432 chars]

articles.author: Joy Wiltermuth
articles.title: Stock-market investors should watch this part of the yield curve for the 'best leading indicator of trouble ahead' - MarketWatch
articles.description: The 10s to 2s ‘curve is going to invert when the economy is really strong,’ says director of portfolio management
articles.content: Investors have been watching the U.S. Treasury yield curve for inversions, a reliable predictor of past economic downturns.Yield curve inversion, and flatting, has been at the forefront for everyone,… [+3423 chars]
